Sentencas: As electricity demand can vary considerably and unpredictably, it is necessary to integrate energy storage with power generation systems.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a hybrid solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system with compressed air energy storage under different power demands

Sentencas: This study investigates a solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system integrated with a gas turbine (GT) for power generation.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a hybrid solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system with compressed air energy storage under different power demands

Sentencas: The advanced adiabatic compressed air energy storage (AA-CAES) system is designed to enhance the system flexibility.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a hybrid solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system with compressed air energy storage under different power demands

Sentencas: Simulations of the proposed power system are performed to demonstrate the amount of power that can supply to the loads during normal and peak modes of operation under steady-state conditions.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a hybrid solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system with compressed air energy storage under different power demands

Sentencas: The pressure ratios of the GT and AA-CAES and the additional air feed are used to design the system and analyze the system performance.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a hybrid solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system with compressed air energy storage under different power demands

Sentencas: The results show that a small additional air feed to the GT is certainly required for the hybrid system.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a hybrid solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system with compressed air energy storage under different power demands

Sentencas: The GT pressure ratio of 2 provides a maximum benefit.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a hybrid solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system with compressed air energy storage under different power demands

Sentencas: The AA-CAES pressure ratio of 5 is recommended to spare some air in the storage and minimize storage volume.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a hybrid solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system with compressed air energy storage under different power demands

Sentencas: Moreover, implementation of the GT and AA-CAES into the integrated fuel cell system allows the system to cope with the variations in power demand.
Titulo: Performance assessment of a hybrid solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cell system with compressed air energy storage under different power demands
